title: WRONG SKIM
body: Riot, can you please refund the lastest skin I accidentally purchased?  I was seeing how much RP I would have lefted over but instead of clicking the X ( exit button ) I accidentally bought it. Please can a riot worker, please help me? Accidentally bought Mafia graves!

replies.body:
Hey there,

The only way for you to refund purchased content is with your 3 allocated refund tokens (See, [Content Refund FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ)).

If you've used up all your tokens then you're out of luck, sorry about that.

>**I ACCIDENTALLY PURCHASED SOMETHING! CAN I HAVE A FREE REFUND?**
We will not provide free refunds for accidental purchases under any circumstances. The only way for you to refund an accidentally purchased item is by using your refund token. When making a purchase, please double check to make sure you are buying your desired item. The store will prompt you to confirm before completing the purchase.
